DOC.brief_summary: A Phase II , Double-Blind , Randomized , Placebo-Controlled , Multicenter , Study Evaluating Efficacy Safety Human , Alpha-1 Antitrypsin ( AAT ) [ Glassia® ] Treatment New Onset Type-1 Diabetes . The study objective : - To assess efficacy intravenous AAT treatment new onset Type 1 Diabetes - To assess safety tolerability intravenous AAT new onset Type 1 Diabetes pediatric young adult population .
